mapper.insert: insert into Module(name,parentid,urlid,valid) select #{module.name},#{pid},#{urlId},1 from dual where not exists(select * from Module where name=#{module.name})
mapper.update: update Module set name=#{module.name},urlid=#{urlId} where parentid=#{pid} and id=#{module.id}
update Module set Valid = 0 where parentid=#{pid} and id=#{module.id}
mapper.select: select mc.id as mcid, mc.moduleId as moduleId, c.id as id, c.name as name, c.title as tile,c.valid as valid from ModuleConfig mc, Config c where mc.moduleid= #{mid} and mc.valid = 1 and mc.configId = c.id
mapper.insert: insert into ModuleConfig(ModuleId,PropertyId,ConfigId,SortKey,Valid) select #{mid},#{propertyId},#{configId},#{sortKey},1 from dual where not exists (select * from ModuleConfig where ModuleId = #{mid} and PropertyId=#{propertyId} and ConfigId=#{configId})
mapper.update: update ModuleConfig set valid=0 where ModuleId=#{mid} and ConfigId= #{config.configId}
mapper.select: select md.parentId as parentId, cw.sortKey as sortKey, cw.id as configWidgetId , w.id as widgetId, w.name as widgetName,w.value as widgetValue, w.propertyId as ProperyID, w.widgetId as refWidgetId, w.configId as refConfigId,w.dataSource as dataSource, w.visible as visible, w.searchable as searchable, w.required as required, w.shareable as shareable from ModuleData md,ModuleConfig mc, ConfigWidget cw, Widget w where mc.moduleid = #{mid} and mc.id = md.fieldId and mc.configId=#{configId} and cw.configId=mc.configId and cw.widgetId = w.id order by md.parentId, cw.sortKey
